reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Power-Packed Convenience - Amazon Basics 9 Volt Alkaline Batteries Review
reviews.reviewText: I recently stocked up on the Amazon Basics 8-Pack 9 Volt Alkaline Batteries, and they have proven to be a reliable and convenient power solution for various devices in my household. These batteries offer a power-packed performance with the added convenience of a multipack. Here's why I'm impressed with the Amazon Basics 9 Volt Alkaline Batteries.Long-Lasting Power (5/5):The primary function of batteries is to provide reliable power, and the Amazon Basics 9 Volt Alkaline Batteries excel in this regard. They deliver long-lasting power to a variety of devices, from smoke detectors to remote controls. The consistent and reliable performance ensures that my devices stay powered when needed.Versatile All-Purpose Use (5/5):The versatility of these batteries is a key advantage. Designed for all-purpose use, I've used them in a range of devices, including smoke alarms, wireless microphones, and various electronic gadgets. The compatibility across different devices makes these batteries a go-to solution for various power needs.Convenient 8-Pack (5/5):The convenience of having an 8-pack is noteworthy. It provides an ample supply of batteries to keep multiple devices running. The bulk packaging is not only cost-effective but also saves me the hassle of frequent battery replacements. It's a practical solution for households with multiple battery-powered devices.5-Year Shelf Life (5/5):The 5-year shelf life is a standout feature, adding to the overall convenience of these batteries. Knowing that I have a reliable power source on hand, even if I don't use all the batteries immediately, gives me peace of mind. The extended shelf life is particularly beneficial for emergency preparedness.Cost-Effective Solution (5/5):In terms of cost-effectiveness, the Amazon Basics 9 Volt Alkaline Batteries stand out. The price per battery in the 8-pack offers excellent value for money. The combination of performance, convenience, and affordability makes these batteries a cost-effective solution for everyday power needs.Amazon Basics Quality (5/5):As part of the Amazon Basics line, these batteries reflect the brand's commitment to quality. The batteries are well-built, and the materials used inspire confidence in their performance. The Amazon Basics quality assurance adds credibility to these batteries as a reliable power source.Environmentally Responsible (5/5):I appreciate the efforts towards environmental responsibility. The Amazon Basics 9 Volt Alkaline Batteries are designed to meet environmental standards, promoting responsible disposal practices. It's a small but meaningful step towards reducing the environmental impact of battery usage.Widespread Availability (5/5):The widespread availability of Amazon Basics products, including these batteries, is a convenience in itself. The easy access to reliable batteries without the need for a special trip to a store adds to the overall user experience.Conclusion:In conclusion, the Amazon Basics 8-Pack 9 Volt Alkaline Batteries have become my preferred choice for powering various devices around my home. With their long-lasting power, versatile all-purpose use, convenient 8-pack, 5-year shelf life, cost-effective solution, Amazon Basics quality, environmentally responsible design, and widespread availability, these batteries deliver on both performance and convenience. Highly recommended for anyone seeking a reliable and cost-effective power solution for everyday devices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable Power at an Unbeatable Price!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently purchased the Amazon Basics 8-Pack 9 Volt Alkaline Performance All-Purpose Batteries, and I am incredibly satisfied with my purchase. These batteries offer outstanding performance at a price that's hard to beat.First and foremost, the value for money with this 8-pack is exceptional. When it comes to batteries, it's essential to strike a balance between quality and affordability, and these batteries deliver on both fronts. The pack size is just right – enough to power multiple devices without having an excessive number of batteries lying around. Plus, the cost per battery is significantly lower compared to many other brands on the market.In terms of performance, these batteries have exceeded my expectations. They have a long-lasting, reliable power output, making them ideal for a wide range of devices, from smoke detectors to remote controls. I appreciate the consistent performance, ensuring that my devices operate smoothly without any unexpected power interruptions.The convenience of having a reliable power source readily available cannot be overstated. These batteries are my go-to choice for various household items, and they have never let me down. I've used them in high-drain devices, and they have proven to be up to the task, providing a stable power supply for extended periods.Additionally, the packaging is simple and effective, making it easy to store the remaining batteries for future use. The batteries are easy to install, and I've never encountered any issues with leaks or damage, a testament to their quality.In conclusion, if you're looking for affordable, high-quality batteries that offer excellent performance and come in a convenient 8-pack size, the Amazon Basics 9 Volt Alkaline Performance All-Purpose Batteries are the way to go. I am thoroughly impressed with their longevity and reliability, and I will continue to rely on them for all my battery needs. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great except each one is INDIVIDUALLY WRAPPED!
reviews.reviewText: These batteries are a great value. I held the fifth star because each battery is tightly wrapped in plastic shrink wrap and you need to cut it off with scissors. I bought these to replace all the smoke alarm batteries in our house and this was beyond annoying. Why Amazon?!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These batteries work great. Great value compared to name brands. Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love that they're individually shrink wrapped!!!
reviews.reviewText: These are great batteries and last as long as any of the competitors. I see numerous complaints about them being individually wrapped and it's astonishing. Being that both contacts are on the same side of the 9v battery, it's easy to accidentally discharge/drain them if not careful while storing them - if they end up where both contacts are resting against any conductive material (including themselves), they will drain to completion, possibly causing a mess or even a fire. They are shrink-wrapped to protect them from this!! If you buy commerically-packaged 9v batteries, they often come with a plastic piece that stays in place across the contacts...but they are much more expensive. This achieves the same result for much cheaper.

reviews.reviewTitle: Batterie valide e durature. Buono il rapporto qualità prezzo.
reviews.reviewText: Ne avevo già acquistato un pacco un paio di anni fa e mi sono servite per la bilancia del bagno, i walkie talkie, il mio tester di rete e diversi giochi per bambini. Mi sono trovato benissimo e le ho riordinate perché in quanto sono affidabili ed economiche.Ho apprezzato molto che ogni batteria è confezionata singolarmente, essendo avvolte da una pellicola di plastica si evita che contatti tocchino accidentalmente i possibili conduttori nelle vicinanze e si scarichino nel tempo anche se non utilizzate, situazione classica in cui si conservano tante batterie in un cassetto, essendo rivestite di metallo questo accade anche se si dovessero toccare tra di loro. In più la confezione di cartone le tiene ordinate e non occupa molto spazio.Sono durevoli come le Duracel, francamente io non ho notato alcuna differenza importante tra queste e le famosissime e costose già citate. Forniscono un’alimentazione senza cali di prestazioni anche quando sono già in utilizzo da molto tempo.La tecnologia Amazon Basics dichiara di prevenire le perdite di energia ed assicura una durata di 5 anni, garantendo una maggiore sicurezza per i dispositivi. Ho apprezzato molto questa sottolineatura, dal momento che l'ultima cosa che mi aspetto è proprio che un dispositivo venga danneggiato da una fuoriuscita di liquido della batteria. Come dicevo non è mai accaduto finora nonostante le utilizzi già da un paio di anni.In conclusione, le batterie Amazon Basics sono un prodotto valido, garantiscono sicurezza e buona durata ad un prezzo molto accessibile.
